awd_abstract_narration: 1  From: dstaudt at NOTE 3/24/94 4:57PM (1212 bytes: 25 ln)  To: gclavon at nsf15  Subject: MOREnet Phase 6  ------------------------------- Message Contents -------------------------------  ---------------------- Original Header Lines (From NOTE) -----------------------  X-Sender: dstaudt@note1.nsf.gov  Mime-Version: 1.0  Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii"  ------------------------------- Message Contents -------------------------------  ABSTRACT  "MOREnet Expansion Phase 6"  University of Missouri - Columbia  PI:  William Mitchell  NCR-9402189      This award adds three higher education institutions to the MOREnet state  network:            College of the Ozarks                   Point Lookout          East Central College                    Union          Harris-Stowe State College              St. Louis    The new institutions connect to a hub located at the University of Missouri  at Columbia.  Faculty and students at the institutions benefit from access  to the resources of the Internet, including libraries and supercomputers.  In addition, they are able to communicate and collaborate with colleagues  at other campuses in pursuit of research and educational projects. The  award provides partial support of the project for two years.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
